description: T.1 Ash - Fell.T.2 Ash - Fell.
decision_conditions: Previous decision issued this year refusing the removal of T.1 (20/01921/TPO). This decision stands, however, T.2 is in poor health so it's removal is permissible.
Conditions 19 (Co2 & Water)  - Officers have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied that a 35% CO2 emissions reduction and internal water usage rates of 105l/p/day can be achieved.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Conditions 19 (Co2 & Water) of planning permission 20/02531/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.
The location plan does not have a name of the road. please amend the location plan with road names.
For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Part demolition of an existing extension, erection of  part two storey/part single storey rear and first floor side extension.'
